briefTitle: A Study to Compare the Safety and Efficacy of A New Eye Drop Formulation With OPTIVE™ in Subjects With Dry Eye Disease

interventions.name: Carboxymethylcellulose Based Eye Drop Formulation A
Carboxymethylcellulose Based Preservative-Free Lubricant Eye Drops

arms.label: Carboxymethylcellulose Based Eye Drop Formulation A

summary: This study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of a carboxymethylcellulose based eye drop formulation compared with carboxymethylcellulose based preservative-free lubricant eye drops (OPTIVE™) in subjects with dry eye disease.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Ocular Surface Disease Index (OSDI) Score at Day 90

effectByArm.arm: Carboxymethylcellulose Based Eye Drop Formulation A
